Drinks.name: Gin Fizz
Drinks.directions: Pour 2oz gin, 1oz lemon juice, 3/4oz simple syrup, and egg white into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake then strain into a glass. Top off with soda water

Drinks.name: Hurricane
Drinks.directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 2oz of each ingeredient, the squeezed lime juice, and shake. Pour into a glass. Garnish with an Orange wedge and cherry

Drinks.name: Lost Plane
Drinks.directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 1 oz of each ingredient and shake. Strain into a glass. Garnish with a lemon twist

Drinks.name: Gimlet
Drinks.directions: Add 3 oz gin, 1/2 oz lime juice, 1/2 oz simple syrup to a shaker. Shake and strain over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge

Drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
Drinks.directions: Pour 1 oz each ingredient over ice. Top with coke. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Drinks.name: Tom Colliins
Drinks.directions: Pour 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, and 1/2 oz simple syrup a glass and top with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Drinks.name: Gin Daisy
Drinks.directions: Pour 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, 1 tsp sugar, and 1/2 tsp grenadine into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a glass. Garnish with a orange wedge and cherry

Drinks.name: Dark and Stormy
Drinks.directions: Pour 2 oz rum, 3oz ginger beer, and 1/2 oz lime juice over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Drinks.name: Daiquiri
Drinks.directions: Add 2 oz rum, 1 oz lime juice, 3/4 oz simple syrup to a shaker full of ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with a lime twist. *Blend the ingredients with ice for a frozen version*

Drinks.name: Painkiller
Drinks.directions: Add all ingredients to a shaker fill of ice. Shake and strain into a glass. Garnish with nutmeg and a pineapple wedge

Drinks.name: El Presidente
Drinks.directions: Add 1.5 oz white rum, 3/4 oz orange curacao, 3/4 oz vermouth, and a dash of grenadine to a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into a glass

Drinks.name: Cable Car
Drinks.directions: Stir 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 cup sugar into a saucer. Rub the rim of a glass with a lemon wedge and dip glass into saucer. Add 1.5 oz rum, 3/4 oz orange curacao, 1/2 ox simple syrup, 1 oz lemon juice to a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into the glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and orange peel

Drinks.name: Mai Tai
Drinks.directions: Pour 1.5 oz white rum, 3/4 oz orange curacao, 3/4 oz lime juice, 1/2 oz orgeat into a shaker full of ice. Shake and pour into a glass. Pour 1/2 oz dark rum over the top. Garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig

Drinks.name: Mojito
Drinks.directions: Muddle 3 mint leaves in a shaker. Add 2 oz rum, 3/4 oz lime juice, 1/2 oz simple syrup to the shaker and top with ice. Shak and strain into a glass. Garnish with a mint spring and lime wedge

Drinks.name: Pina Colada
Drinks.directions: Pour 2 oz rum, 1.5 oz cream of coconut, 1.5 oz pineapple juice, 1/2 oz lime juice into a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into a glass over ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge

Drinks.name: Martini
Drinks.directions: Add 2.5 oz gin, 1/2 oz vermouth, 1/2 oz olive brine to a glass full of ice and stir. Strain into another glass. Garnis with 2 olives

Drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
Drinks.directions: Add 2 oz gin to a glass of ice. Top with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wheel

Drinks.name: Negroni
Drinks.directions: Add 1 oz of each ingredient to a glass. Fill with ice. Stir and garnish with an orange wedge

Drinks.name: Last Word
Drinks.directions: Add 3/4 oz of each ingredient to a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into a glass

Drinks.name: Bees Knees
Drinks.directions: Add 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, 1/2 oz honey to a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into a glass

Drinks.name: Gin Sling
Drinks.directions: Add 1.5 oz gin, 1 oz vermouth, 1 oz simple syrup, 1 oz lemon juice, 1 dash bitters to a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into a glass and top with sodea water. Garnish with a lemon peel.
